title: Cooperation
context: ยง571-86 Cooperation. Every public official or department shall render all assistance and cooperation within the official&rsquo;s or its jurisdictional power which may further the objects of this chapter. The court may seek the cooperation of organizations whose object is to protect or aid children and family life. [L 1965, c 232, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง333-41; HRS ยง571-86; gen ch 1985]
